mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pointshop_board (p_bno, p_title, p_explain, sellstate, purchaseplace, deliverycharge, userid) values (#{p_bno}, #{p_title}, #{p_explain}, #{sellstate}, #{purchaseplace}, #{deliverycharge}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_pointshop_board b join tbl_member m on b.userid = m.userid order by p_regdate desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select p_picture from tbl_pointshop_board_pic where p_bno = #{p_bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_pointshop_board set p_title = #{p_title}, p_explain = #{p_explain}, sellstate = #{sellstate}, purchaseplace = #{purchaseplace}, deliverycharge = #{deliverycharge} where p_bno = #{p_bno}
mapper.select: select pno from tbl_product where p_bno = #{p_bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (pno, p_bno, p_name) values (#{pno}, #{p_bno}, #{p_name})
insert into tbl_product_info (p_ino, pno, p_option, p_price, p_discount, p_stock, p_seq) values (seq_product_info_ino.nextval, #{pno}, #{p_option}, #{p_price}, #{p_discount}, #{p_stock}, #{p_seq})
mapper.select: select p_picture from tbl_product_pic where pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pointshop_tag (p_tno, p_bno, p_tag) values (seq_pointshop_tag_tno.nextval, #{p_bno}, #{p_tag})
mapper.select: select p_tag from tbl_pointshop_tag where p_bno = #{p_bno}
